text: aur vah usamen hamesha apana kiya bhugatata rahega aur usake lie badee roosavaee ka azaab hai aur tumhaaree auraton mein se jo auraten badakaaree karen to unakee badakaaree par apane logon mein se chaar gavaahee lo aur phir agar chaaron gavaah usakee tasadeeq karen to (usakee saza ye hai ki) unako gharon mein band rakho yaho tak ki maut aa jae ya khuda unakee koee (doosaree) raah nikaale
